actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to increase from 7 years to 11 years from date of separation from service the period in which multiple sclerosis is presumed to have been incurred during service.

summary.text: Increases from seven years to eleven years from date of separation from service the period in which multiple sclerosis is presumed to have been incurred during service for purposes of veterans' benefits. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 312 (a)(4)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to increase from 7 years to 11 years from date of separation from service the period in which multiple sclerosis is presumed to have been incurred during service.
